name: Natural Cure
summary: If the user is under a status condition, upon switching out they will be cured of that status.
viability: Natural Cure is great for more defensive Pokémon, like Blissey or Roselia. It also can be useful for Pokémon that have good offense, such as Trevenant or Altaria. Preventing a poison on the former and burn on the latter can not only increase longevity, but also increase their usefulness in battle.
